title: "Bee Happy" should be renamed "Bee Glad" to match the others.
body:
>Three buzzworthy new emotes are now on the PBE - "Bee Mad", "Bee Sad", and "Bee Happy":

If they just change "Happy" to "Glad," they'll all rhyme perfectly, therefore it must be done (not to mention this is the easiest change they'd ever make).

What do you think?
